name: M00m World
summary: Step into m00m world, a cyberpunk infused multiplayer mobile universe inspired by our original webcomic. m00m is a new place to hangout. Build your customizable container home, play mini-games, embark on simple quests, and connect with friends in real-time. With regular updates, endless adventures, and a creative community, the m00m resistance needs you to shape the future and make your mark in the fight against the F8 Corporation!
